title: BT Fleischman on sale...
content:
I am _so_ over the ridiculously expensive DTL Fleischman.

Buy the fabulous Bitstream interpretation while it’s on sale for only $29.25 a style.  
It comes loaded all those goodies we expect in a good text face these days too.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/fleischman-bt-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011012208/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/fleischman-bt-pro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/fleischman-bt-pro/")

Mikey :-)

PS... I can’t think of any time before where Bitstream had put their fonts on sale on MyFonts. Hopefully, we’ll see more sales like this from them in the future.
author: SuperUltraFabulous
